hero.title: Welcome to Maxvario
hero.description: The Home of Hike and Fly
hero.longText: The destination website for the sport of hike and fly – the world’s toughest adventure sport. Everything for the hike and fly athletes and hike and fly event organisers.​

homeIntro.introDescription: Discover the best of hike and fly! From thrilling races to inspiring adventures, we bring you news and events across various outdoor sports. There's something here for everyon

upcoming.title: Upcoming Events
upcoming.description: Several activities, various climate, our events are always HOT!

latest-blog.title: Latest Blog
latest-blog.description: Your Source for the Latest Stories, Tips, and Adventures

latest-news.title: Recent News
latest-news.description: Breaking Updates and Insights from the World of Hike and Fly

footer.description: The destination website for the sport of hike and fly – the world’s toughest adventure sport.

page.title: Maxvario Calendar
page.description: Plan your next adventure with ease! Our comprehensive calendar lets you explore upcoming hike-and-fly events by date, location, and difficulty. Stay ahead with event details, registration links, and everything you need to join the action. Whether you're looking for local meetups or international challenges, our calendar keeps you connected to the thrill of the sport.
